SIGNUP.MIN_LENGTH_USERNAME: Your username must be at least 6 characters long
SIGNUP.MIN_LENGTH_EMAIL: Your email must be at least 6 characters long
SIGNUP.MIN_LENGTH_PASSWORD: Your password must be at least 8 characters long
SIGNUP.MAX_LENGTH_PASSWORD: Your password cannot exceed 20 characteres long

RESET_PASWORD.TITLE: Reset password
RESET_PASWORD.EMAIL_SEND: A message has been sent to your email to change the password
RESET_PASWORD.SUCCESS: your password has been changed, now you can log in on mobile app or web page.

SECTIONS.SECTION_TEXT: Create the sections of the menu of each restaurant
SECTIONS.RESTAURANT_SECTION: Select the restaurants where the section is available
SECTIONS.NO_RESTAURANT_CREATED: There are no restaurants created on the platform

SUBCATEGORIES.SUBCATEGORY_TEXT: Create the subcategories of your menu and select the category to which it belongs

PROMOTIONS.PROMOTION_TEXT: Create your promotions and select the restaurants where they will be seen

RESTAURANT_REGISTER.ADD_PAYMENTMETHODS_RESTURANT: Add payment methods accepted by the restaurant

RESTAURANT_REGISTER.ADD_LOCATION: Enter the location of the establishment

TABLES.TABLES_TEXT: Select the restaurant you want and the number of tables you want to create
TABLES.SEARCH_TABLES: Select the restaurant to show the associated tables

GO_TO_STORE.CONTENT: We did most of the heavy lifting for you to provide a default stylings that incorporate our custom components

ITEMS.NOT_ADDITIONS: No additions created for the establishment
